kernfrasen: aus der Einsicht in unsere Schuld kommen
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: REPENTANCE IS A CHANGE OF DIRECTION ON A PATH
FAITH COMMUNITY IS A GLOBAL FAMILY

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Evangelium zusammengefaltet wie das Kleid einer Prinzessin in einer Nussschale.

mapping_structuur.doel_element: The expansive meaning of the Gospel

cognitieve_implicaties: The Gospel is beautiful but currently hidden or compressed.
It requires human action (unfolding/trying on) to become useful.
theologische_implicaties: Theology is not just for study but for 'wearing' (embodiment).
ethische_implicaties: One must check if the Gospel 'fits' their current life choices.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Trivialization of the Gospel as a luxury item (princess dress).

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: A highly creative, non-conventional opening that disrupts the 'dead' religious schema of 'The Word of God'.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Gottes Hände... schmieden vor unseren Augen aus Schwertern Pflugscharen.

mapping_structuur.doel_element: Human actions aligned with God's will
The slow process of social transformation

cognitieve_implicaties: God is not a distant observer but an active worker.
theologische_implicaties: Synergism: God's hands are seen where humans act for justice.
ethische_implicaties: Passivity is a denial of God's existence ('Gott hat keine Hände').
onbedoelde_consequenties: Risk of reducing God to mere human political action.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Uses the biblical imagery of Micah/Isaiah but revitalizes it by linking it to the 'hands' metaphor.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon is tightly woven around the tension between two 'grips': the 'hands of the death machine' (military-industrial complex) and the 'hands of God'.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'cold' time of the world is placed into the 'warm' hands of God, resolving the existential anxiety of the 'empty time' mentioned at the start.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the dead metaphor of 'God's hands' by giving them specific, modern tasks (protecting trees, refusing fruit from apartheid South Africa).
sterktes.voorbeeld: Gott hat viele Hände... sie beschützen die Bäume.

risicos.beschrijving: The devil is personified as a man in a suit, which might lead to a simplistic view of systemic evil.
risicos.voorbeeld: Teufel, der heutzutage im eleganten Zweireiher herumläuft.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation focuses on 'evil individuals' rather than 'evil systems'.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A world under threat by 'death machines' (nuclear weapons, environmental destruction).
sub_worlds: The prison cell of John the Baptist/El Salvador
The future world where swords are plowshares

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: God is not a 'Master Plan' (Architect) but 'Hands' (Laborer).

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Critique of the 'Beruhigungspille' (calming pill) view of providence.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as the one whose hands work through us.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the 1989 Kirchentag theme.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully shifts from a JURIDICAL/ECONOMIC domain (traditional view of repentance/debt) to a MEDICAL/MANUAL domain. God is not a judge but a healer and worker. The dominant landscape is one of 'Embodied Resistance'.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Link it more to the 'Nussschale' image to maintain the aesthetic opening.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Kingdom is the 'fabric' of the dress we are trying on.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition from the 'Princess dress' to 'Blacksmithing' is abrupt.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Connect the 'fitting' of the dress to the 'work' of the hands (e.g., the dress is a work-garment).

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Emphasize the 'laying into God's hands' as a free act of will more clearly.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To deepen the 'protecting trees' and 'plowshares' imagery.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in political homiletics that uses CMT to turn abstract dogmas into concrete ethical imperatives.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While the 'Nussschale' is aesthetic, CMT reveals it functions as a cognitive frame for 'containment' and 'revelation'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Focuses not on the 'experience cycle' but on the underlying conceptual mappings that make the experience possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that Sölle's theology of 'God has no hands but ours' is a literalization of a conceptual metaphor to drive ethical urgency.

appendices.notities: Sölle uses 'Time' as a quasi-physical substance that can be moved from one container (Death Machine) to another (God's Hands).
